snippet: Corruption allegations against a political party treasurer are hurting national morale and the credibility of institutions, distracting the government from economic concerns, political observers say.
abstract: Memo from Spain; sense of scandal surrounding Spanish Prime Min Mariano Rajoy has crested yet again, after another week of allegations against Luis Barcenas, former treasurer or Rajoy's Popular Party; political observers say allegations against Barcenas are hurting national morale and credibility of institutions, distracting government from economic concerns.
lead_paragraph: Corruption allegations against a political party treasurer are hurting national morale and the credibility of institutions, distracting the government from economic concerns, political observers say.

headline.main: Spain’s Real Crisis Is a Leadership Void, Analysts Say
headline.print_headline: Slow-Moving Scandal Edges Closer to the Top
